attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seeing as the british tax payer has just paid/going to pay 24 Billion for Northern Rock I want to know when the government will announce the issuing of NR shares to the people who just paid for it?

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
